Home.title: Hulak
Home.primary-subheading: Trust your package to us, we have been trusted by the whole Nepal.
Home.glimpse-subheading: Looking for a reliable postal service in Nepal? Look no further! Nepal Postal Service is your trusted partner for all your mail and package delivery needs. Whether you're sending letters, documents, or packages, we've got you covered with our extensive network and top-notch services.
Home.feature-subheading: We believe in providing top-quality services without burning a hole in your pocket. Our competitive rates make us the go-to choice for both individuals and businesses.

real-time-tracking.title: Real Time Tracking
real-time-tracking.description: Stay updated on the status of your shipment with our real-time tracking feature.

packaging.title: Packaging
packaging.description: We use quality packaging for the safety of your goods!

mobile-app-tracker.title: Mobile App Tracker
mobile-app-tracker.description: You can track your package using mobile. This makes it easier for you to find out where your package is anytime and anywhere!

insurances-services.title: Insurance Services
insurances-services.description: We will provide insurance if your item is damaged in transit. So, don't worry if your item is damaged because we will take care of it!

pickup-delivery.title: Pickup Delivery
pickup-delivery.description: We will pick up your package at home. Wait there. we'll be there!

24-hours.title: 24 Hours
24-hours.description: We will send your package non-stop so that it arrives quickly!

Home.delivery-subheading: With an extensive network that spans across every nook and cranny of Nepal, we ensure your mail and packages reach their destination, no matter how remote.

CreateOrder.local-storage-message: A previous unsubmitted order was loaded. Do you want to start a fresh?
CreateOrder.source-description: Please provide the following details about the sender. It's important to ensure that all the information provided is accurate and up to date. Double-check the details before submitting the form to avoid any potential issues with the pickup of your package.
CreateOrder.destination-description: Please provide the following details about the reciever.Double-check the details before submitting the form to avoid any potential issues with the delivery of your package.
CreateOrder.what-title: What kind of packaging are you using?
CreateOrder.what-description: Please provide the following details about the package being sent. Note that the dimensions are in centimeters.
CreateOrder.sustinable-title: Almost Done. Let's check a few more details.
CreateOrder.sustinable-description: Help the environment by making your package carbonneutral. We'll plant a tree every package you send.

sustinable-fields.heading: What are you shipping?(Write in detail)
sustinable-fields.is-carbon-neutral: Carbon Neutral-Offset the environmental impact of your shipment (+रु)

Footer.description: Trust your package to us, we have been trusted by the whole Nepal.

PLACED.title: PLACED
PLACED.description: The order is confirmed and the payment is processed.

PICKED.title: PICKED
PICKED.description: The order is picked up from the sender.

SHIPPED.title: SHIPPED
SHIPPED.description: The order has left the sender location.

OUTFORDELIVERY.title: OUTFORDELIVERY
OUTFORDELIVERY.description: Look out for the delivery guy. Your's order is out for delivery

DELIVERED.title: DELIVERED
DELIVERED.description: Its delivered. If you are still checking here, go check your mail

Support.contact-description: Fill up the form below to contact
Support.name: Name

ForgotPassword.title: Forgot your password?
ForgotPassword.description: You'll get an email with a reset link.

VerifyEmail.title: Verify your Email
VerifyEmail.description: You'll get an email with a verification link.
